lead: Visionary Data Architect and software developer with deep expertise in information modeling, Semantic Web technologies, and FAIR principles. Skilled in designing scalable, decentralized architectures grounded in Data Mesh and Domain Driven Design, with the ability to also implement end-to-end solutions. Adept at bridging technical and non-technical stakeholders, driving adoption of machine-readable, interoperable data models, and breaking down data silos through Linked Data and knowledge graph initiatives. Proven track record in unifying architecture strategy with business goals while delivering robust, production-grade solutions in cloud, DevOps, and full-stack environments.

description: Responsible for enablement of modeling, including languages, standards, tooling, and automation.
Developed model transformations of CIM/CGMES models for easier use by developers and machines.
Member of CIM working group improving model maintenance, interoperability and usability.
Member of NBEA working group providing advice on information modeling and data architecture.
Initiated and led a proof of concept to help EDSN adopt modern, machine-readable, standardized information modeling.
Colleborated with students and PhDs from HAN Data & Knowledge Engineering, combining coordination with hands-on research and implementation.
Researched LLM-based approaches to generate knowledge graphs from wiki and PDF documents.
Wrote W3C standards-compliant definitions including a URI policy and DCAT-based data product specification.
Developed software to generate technical schemas from information models.
Designed metadata-driven Data Mesh architecture based on FAIR principles and Linked Data.
Co-developed API and libraries to support image recognition model workflows.
Maintained DevOps work using Jenkins, Kubernetes, and Git.
Developed business-friendly test suites and reusable test code for SOAP messaging through Digitaal Samenwerkingsplatform (DSP).
Built an end-to-end testing application (frontend and backend) from requirements to implementation.

past.description: Developed new features for the website.
Wrote XSL templates to scrape websites and initiated and created a web application to help the team manage the workload.
Developed new features for the customer control panel.
Wrote BI applications for web shops, maintained wiki and was lead of the service desk.

education.description: Trained to think like a mathematician and solve challenging, abstract problems. Also followed programming and CS courses.
I completed the first year and then enrolled at the Radboud University.
